share.share_text:
Mackerel, pearl barley & beetroot risotto. The mackerel was line caught during a fishing trip off the east coast of North Uist on a rare day of cloudless sunshine. Scallops was our main endeavour that day and I shall share our findings later this week. For now, we start here, and dive into a week full of beetroots and locally sourced, sustainable seafood. 

#sustainability #sustainable #sustainablefishing #localfish #outerhebrides #outerhebridescollective #outerhebridesofscotland #outerhebridestourism #hebrides #visitscotland #visitouterhebrides #beetroot #vegetarian #vegetarianrecipes #photooftheday
